resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3442</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3442</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Dictats</string>
            <string language="en">Dictations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diktate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dictées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ditados</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dettature</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπαγορεύσεις</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) de llengua catalana que proposa dictats classificats per temes i dificultats amb l'objectiu de millorar l'ortografia. Una veu dicta els textos i després se'n pot fer l'autocorrecció amb el text escrit original.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on dictations in Catalan, classified by subject and difficulty, with the aim of improving spelling. A voice dictates the texts and afterwards pupils can correct their efforts with the written text.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">dictat</string>
            <string language="en">dictation</string>
            <string language="es">dictado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">exercici</string>
            <string language="en">exercise</string>
            <string language="es">ejercicio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ortografia</string>
            <string language="en">spelling</string>
            <string language="es">ortografía</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) auf Diktaten auf das katalanisch, eingestuft durch Thema und
Schwierigkeit, mit dem Ziel des Verbesserns von von Rechtschreibung. 
Eine Stimme schreibt die Texte vor und danach können Pupillen 
ihre Bemühungen mit dem schriftlichen Text beheben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur 
des dictées dans le catalan, classifié par le sujet et la 
difficulté, dans le but d'améliorer l'épellation. Une voix 
dicte les textes et après les pupilles peuvent corriger leurs efforts
avec le texte écrit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) em 
ditados no catalan, classificado pelo assunto e pela dificuldade, com 
o alvo de melhorar a soletração. Uma voz dita os textos e mais
tarde as pupilas podem corrigir seus esforços com o texto escrito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) sulle
dettature nel catalan, classificato per l'oggetto e la difficoltà, 
allo scopo di migliorare ortografia. Una voce detta i testi ed 
in seguito le pupille possono correggere i loro sforzi con il testo 
scritto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στις 
υπαγορεύσεις στα καταλανικά, που ταξινομούνται από το θέμα και τη
δυσκολία, με το στόχο την ορθογραφία. Μια φωνή υπαγορεύει 
τα κείμενα και κατόπιν οι μαθητές μπορούν να διορθώσουν τις 
προσπάθειές τους με το γραπτό κείμενο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diktat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rechtschreibung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dictée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">exercice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">épellation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ditado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">exercício</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">soletração</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dettatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esercitazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ortografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υπαγόρευση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άσκηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ορθογραφία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
